org.transitime.gtfs.gtfsStructs

Class GtfsBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.gtfs.gtfsStructs.GtfsBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GtfsAgency, GtfsCalendar, GtfsCalendarDate, GtfsFareAttribute, GtfsFareRule, GtfsFeedInfo, GtfsFrequency, GtfsRoute, GtfsShape, GtfsStop, GtfsStopTime, GtfsTransfer, GtfsTrip

    public class GtfsBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for GTFS struct classes. The main GTFS struct classes must inherit from this class. Keeps track of line numbers. Also handles errors when necessary data is missing in GTFS file.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
